<!-- VotePage.vue -->
<template>
    <!-- ... -->
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
    // ...
    methods: {
      // ...
      submitVote() {
        // 提交投票请求到后端
        // 这里简化处理,直接更新数据
        this.hasVoted = true;
        this.selectedCampaignId = 'Campaign123';
        this.selectedOptionName = this.options.find(option => option.id === this.selectedOption).name;
        this.saveVotedOption();
        this.$emit('vote-submitted');
      },
      // ...
    }
  };
  </script>
  
  


  <style scoped>
  .vote-form {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
  }
  
  .vote-select {
    margin-right: 20px;
  }
  
  .vote-button {
    background-color: #007bff;
    color: #fff;
    border: none;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  
  .vote-button:disabled {
    background-color: #ccc;
    cursor: not-allowed;
  }
  
  select:disabled {
    background-color: #f0f0f0;
  }
  </style>
